#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

main(){

    int n,i,ans,a[51],sum,step;
    step=1;
    while(1){
        sum = 0;ans = 0;
        cin >> n; if(n == 0) break;

        for(i=0;i<n;i++){ cin >> a[i]; sum+=a[i];}

        sum = sum/n;

        for(i=0;i<n;i++) {
            if((sum-a[i])>=0) ans+=sum-a[i];
            else ans+=a[i]-sum;
        }
             printf("Set #%d\nThe minimum number of moves is %d.\n",step,ans/2);
        step++;
    }

}
